chapter.title: Checking Signature Expiration
chapter.para: It is important to regularly check your zone for signatures that are nearing expiration. If the signatures are close to expiring, or already have expiried, see for how to resign the zone.

section.title: Check the Zone for Expiring Signatures
section.para: This checks the keyrec file to see if the zone has signatures expiring in the next 10 days.
